NetLynx Technology Pte Ltd \u00A9 (Click for more info)
WARNING : This will reset all settings and you will need to register again. Continue?

NetLynx Technology is a software and hardware engineering company that focuses on the development and deployment of innovative products and solutions for the communications and automotive sectors.
Our mission is to deliver quality products and services to the marketplace, backed up by our dependable technical support.

Communications

Our communications department has been focusing the applications that tap on the services provided by the Service providers, such as SMS / GPRS / 3G / Voice, and even broadcast media such as Digital Video Broadcast, as well as GPS.

Automotive

Our Automotive department focuses on the automotive consumer electronics. We have introduced products such as GPS boxes, DVB Receivers and other electronic controls that caters to the demanding conditions of a vehicular environment.

Communications - Automotive Integration. Unlocking the potential of a connected Vehicle

We believe that the integration of communications and Automotive will be the next big advancement, similar to the merger of communications and information technology ( InfoComm ) a decade ago.
Password will be needed when opening application
